attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to try and support my FAVORITE orange cheeto but all the app did was crash 😫😭🙏. What am I supposed to do now 💔💔. This app is so 🤬 and now I will never support that ugly oompa loompa 🤢. I am so sorry to the people that downloaded this app 😔

feeling: disappointed 😔😫💔✨
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD 😤😭🤚

attributes.review: This app is absolute garbage. As soon as I downloaded it my refrigerator threw my food on the floor. It went haywire and destroyed my couch along with my 1995 tv. Then the CIA came and destroyed my moms car! Someone is going to be paying. Don’t download this app, it’s not worth the SPACE.
attributes.title: ATROCIOUS

attributes.review: This app is just not worth the time pls do not download bc not only is it slow but Donald himself will pop out the screen and harass you so I do not suggest downloading this horrible app🖕
attributes.title: Horrible and not worth the space 🖕🖕

attributes.review: i got this app to support the orange man 🍊. but once it downloaded it gave my phone a virus 🦠 that quickly spread to me!! i started to show all the signs of corona. I THINK TRUMPS APP IS THE REASON THERE IS CORONA. HE NEEDS TO STOP BLAMING CHINA AND TAKE RESPONSIBILITY FOR THIS OUTBREAK. ITS UNBELIEVABLE. anyways i also would like to say that trump is a roach 🦟🦟🦟🦟🦟. no wait he’s the bat that dude ate 😍🦇.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep up with the Great King of america, Donald Jenius Trump. however as soon as i downloaded it, my hair turned green and i began yelling at every man to die. IT TURNED ME INTO A LIBERAL. i shouted constantly at cops and only ate from vegan stores until i deleted it. AWFUL APP. HATE IT ALMOST AS MUCH AS I LOVE TRUMP.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER.

attributes.review: this app was absolutely horrible and should be BANNED! it stole my child AND my husband and didn’t even say sorry! it gave me a virus so bad it was worse than corona! and rumor has it that the app makes animals go extinct 😭😡
attributes.title: the WORST experience

attributes.review: Right when I downloaded this app my phone got SPAMMED with text after text that had insults about each and every person in my family!!! 😡😡 and then when I BLOCKED the numbers someone SHOWED UP AT MY APARTMENT and when I opened the door they SLAPPED ME WITH A RAW PIECE OF CHICKEN. WILL NEVER RECOMMEND THIS APP TO ANYONE DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: This app is trying to get on your bad side like please just stop nobody likes it everybody’s giving it one star reviews might as well just leave it all it’s gonna do is brainwash you and we all know that.
attributes.title: #WorstAppEver

attributes.review: i opened this app up with hopes to CONNECT with the president of the unites states, but since the app runs slower than the PROGRESSION OF EQUALITY FOR MINORITIES, i was unable to do so. this app is slow, glitchy, and it is broke beyond repair. this app should be deleted from the app store at this point. TERRIBLE APP!!!
attributes.title: AWFUL APP!!!

attributes.review: I can’t believe how much I was ripped off. My dog was extremely offended on how much time was stolen from his tummy rubbing time and it’s all due to the app. If I could go lower than one star I would. Complete waste of time.
attributes.title: Worst App in the App Store
